Black fiery demonic dogs that hunt in packs.

column9: A ten-foot tall Horror stalks tunnels and caves, using its audible clicking as a form of echolocation. Its vision is very poor, and it is easily disoriented by loud noises.

column10: \subparagraph{Leech:} if the bite reduces STR score, the swarm restores the same amount of STR.
\subparagraph{Pounce:} pass a \save{DEX} or be knocked prone and take Claws and Bite attacks combined.

column9: Big and ill-tempered man-eating brutes.

column11: Red Dragons instinctively hoard treasure, particularly gold items. A dragon's hoard will be worth 5d20g. If properly harvested, dead dragon's parts will be worth 100g to specialist buyers.

column9: Does not normally attack. Able to turn metal into rust-like dust, which it then consumes. If a melee opponent is carrying a metal weapon, shield, or armour, the Rust Monster will turn one of these to rust as an action, unless they pass a \save{DEX}.
